title: Rito merch store
body:
Hi guys 
As some of you know riot is opening a merch store in na/eu does anyone know about Australia and what the shipping prices are?{{champion:268}}

replies.body:
RedBeard stated the following.

> We have 3 distribution centers at launch to fulfill the America's, Europe, and Asia, but may need to open some sub DCs as well depending on volumes and a variety of other factors.

Generally we can grab things from Asia, being part of the Asian-pacific region.
It shouldn't be too bad hopefully.
well I'm from NZ so the chances of anything shipping to my country is 0% :(
